name: email-sales-map
description: Data visualization tool that maps email sales data on an interactive world map
author: Andrew

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:worker
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:worker
scripts.lint:worker: cd worker && echo 'Worker linting completed (no linter configured)'
scripts.test: npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:frontend
